name: G7⚡Bloodred⚡Spock⚡Snappy
bio: Ugh! I'm G7⚡Bloodred⚡Spock⚡Snappy. I'm a Dogwalker by day, and I like pole dancing by night. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. Our friendship will be preposterous, brilliant, and full of apple pie.
